ygData.messageBody:
> "Specialization � New Functionality
> The various Specialization skills will be implemented such
> that if a spell is
> cast in, for example, the abjuration family, the
> Specialization � Abjuration
> skill will be checked (if present) and if successful, will
> decrease the
> amount of mana used to cast the spell. The Specialization
> skills are as
> follows: Specialization � Abjuration, Specialization � Alteration,
> Specialization � Conjuration, Specialization � Divination,
> and Specialization
> � Evocation."

Sounds like something very worthwhile to do. I'm already thinking of
the possibilities of a Wizard with Evocation and Specialize-Evocation
maxed out. Must be a fearsome sight to behold. I'll definitely save
some practices for this, if it ever gets implemented!

Aznyin
Level 15 Erudite Wizard
Chivalric Order of Norrath
